answers.author: Keith Donner
answers.text:
I can't imagine that to be an easy one to address.  It is like any other benchmark and you'd have to compare apples to apples, to use the old cliche'.  Different departments will have different philosophies about how much maintenance or even capital construction they do vs. contract out.  Are you in snow country or not?  How old are streets & equipment?  Far too many variables for any formula to answer from my point of view.  Perhaps there is some organization out there that tries to compile some stats like American Public Works Association.
